name: Geometry dash level maker
description:
Geometry dash is a rhythm based 2d side scrolling platformer game developed by Robert Topalla and published by Robtop games in 2013.

Controls:

pressing Z and M at the same time: toggle level editor                                                                             editor controls: click to place/delete object                                                                                                1: blocks. 2: inside geometry 3: spikes 4: long blocks 5: special blocks (eg. portals)             6: speed blocks and more 7: slopes and more 8: pits and more 9: Monsters and                   more                                                                                                                                                                           game controls:

[w], [up arrow] click, and [space] to jump
